Release Notes
=============

**1.2.0 (unreleased)**

* Dropped support for Python 2.6

**1.1.1 (2016-11-21)**

* Fixed packaging of ``pypom.interfaces``

**1.1.0 (2016-11-17)**

* Added support for Splinter

  * Thanks to `@davidemoro <https://github.com/davidemoro>`_ for the PR

**1.0.0 (2016-05-24)**

* Official release
